name: Parenting (ojaowier)
description:
Parenting is a 2D platformer where you have to transport your toddler to your home. Get irritated when your child throws fits and tantrums and stop them from injuring themselves, while still making time to answer phone calls from your very important work. There are 3 levels in total.

This game is an entry to GMTK:s game jam 2020, thanks for stopping by and enjoy the game!
